Articles.Content: When I double-click on the installation .EXE, it wants to install to the folder that the installation .EXE currently resides in. KSP resides on a dedicated drive (G)...should I just install to "G" drive or install to G:\Kerbal Space Program folder?

I run KSP on Linux, installed via Steam. So I cannot tell you what the .exe should do.

What I can tell you is where the expansion data should wind up: in the GameData subdirectory of your KSP installation. Here it looks e.g.:
  .../Kerbal Space Program_1.7.3/GameData/SquadExpansion/Serenity/

The "Kerbal Space Program_1.7.3" directory name was chosen by me, but the rest should be the same on your installation.
